update gas_card_log
card_no = #{card_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
card_type = #{card_type,jdbcType=INTEGER},

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `gas_card_log` (`card_no`,`card_type`,`card_status`,`workstation`,`workstation_resp`, `batch_no`,`operator`,`storage_time`,`release_time`,`memo`,`card_property`) select `card_no`,`card_type`,`card_status`,`workstation`,`workstation_resp`, `batch_no`,`operator`,`storage_time`,`release_time`,`memo`, `card_property` from gas_card where card_flag_id > #{startID,jdbcType=INTEGER} and card_flag_id < #{endID,jdbcType=INTEGER}
